title: Chapter details information

xdm:friendlyName.title: Chapter Name
xdm:friendlyName.description: The friendly name of the chapter and or segment.

xdm:length.title: Chapter Length Or Duration
xdm:length.description: The length of the chapter, in seconds.

xdm:offset.title: Chapter Offset
xdm:offset.description: The offset of the chapter, in seconds, inside the content from the start.

xdm:index.title: Chapter Position
xdm:index.description: The index of the chapter inside the content.

xdm:chapterID.title: Chapter ID
xdm:chapterID.description: The auto-generated ID of the chapter.

xdm:timePlayed.title: Chapter Time Played
xdm:timePlayed.description: The time spent on the chapter. The value will be displayed in the time format (HH:MM:SS) in Analysis Workspace and Reports & Analytics. In Data Feeds, Data Warehouse, and Reporting APIs the values will be displayed in seconds.
